medium: Plant fibers, feathers, seed pods, snail shells, wood, bark, animal hide and fur and other materials
title: Tunic
description: long, large tunic made of brown knotted, twisted plant fibers with open weave; no sleeves; bottom hem and arm openings trimmed in brown and golden-brown feathers; front and back of tunic overall embellished with many attached elements:  disc-shaped and roughly rectangular seed pods, large snail shells, stuffed plant fiber \"pillows\" and purses, pieces of bark and wood, stuffed \"pillows\" made of animal hide with fur, and additional feathers
